footer.about: Specialty coffee and artisanal cookies made with love for your break.

c-1.name: Biscoff
c-1.description: Dough with spices and filled with the famous Lotus Biscoff biscuit cream.

c-2.name: Brownie
c-2.description: The intensity of brownie cocoa transformed into a dense and ultra-chocolatey cookie.

c-3.name: Cappuccino
c-3.description: For coffee lovers. Dough with a touch of coffee, finished with generous pieces of caramelized chocolate.

c-4.name: Salted Caramel
c-4.description: The perfect balance between the sweetness of artisanal caramel and a touch of fleur de sel to enhance the flavor.

c-5.name: Classic
c-5.description: The traditional recipe. Buttery dough with generous pieces of dark chocolate and a touch of oats.

c-6.name: Ferrero Rocher
c-6.description: Inspired by the bonbon. Chocolate, crunchy hazelnuts, and creamy filling.

c-7.name: Raspberry, Pistachio & Cream Cheese
c-7.description: An explosion of flavors. The acidity of raspberry, the crunch of pistachio, and the creaminess of cream cheese in the filling.

c-8.name: Kinder Bueno
c-8.description: Vanilla dough with pieces of white chocolate and milk chocolate, filled with creamy Kinder filling and covered with Kinder chocolate.

c-9.name: Macadamia with White Chocolate & Red Fruit Jam
c-9.description: Pure sophistication. The buttery taste of macadamia, the sweetness of white chocolate, and the balanced acidity of red fruit jam.

c-10.name: Walnut
c-10.description: Classic dough with the crunch and striking flavor of selected walnuts.

c-11.name: Nutella
c-11.description: The darling. Cookie generously filled with authentic Nutella hazelnut cream.

c-12.name: Oreo
c-12.description: Dark black cocoa dough filled with white chocolate ganache and crunchy pieces of the world's favorite cookie.

c-13.name: Pistachio
c-13.description: Made with real pistachio. Dough flavored with concentrated pistachio pieces and filled with a delicious pistachio cream.

c-14.name: Red Velvet
c-14.description: Reddish cocoa dough with a velvety touch and pieces of creamy white chocolate.

cq-1.name: Brewed Coffee
cq-1.description: Freshly brewed coffee, highlighting the aromatic notes and natural sweetness of the bean. Gentle and comforting like a hug.

cq-2.name: Espresso
cq-2.description: Intense, full-bodied, and with velvety crema. The essence of our coffee.

cq-3.name: Vanilla Flat White
cq-3.description: The silky texture of Flat White with an aromatic touch of vanilla syrup.

cq-4.name: Salted Caramel Flat White
cq-4.description: Our Flat White sweetened with caramel and a slight salty touch to enhance the coffee.

cq-5.name: Pistachio Flat White
cq-5.description: Creamy Flat White infused with the sophisticated flavor of pistachio.

cq-6.name: Flat White
cq-6.description: Double espresso covered by a thin layer of steamed milk. Silky and intense.

cq-7.name: Mocha
cq-7.description: The classic combination of espresso, steamed milk, and a rich chocolate ganache.

cq-8.name: Piccolo Latte
cq-8.description: A 'mini latte'. A shot of espresso with a little steamed milk, highlighting the coffee flavor.

cg-1.name: Affogato
cg-1.description: The perfect union of dessert and coffee. A scoop of vanilla ice cream 'drowned' in a hot espresso.

cg-2.name: Cold Brew
cg-2.description: Coffee cold brewed for long hours. Smooth flavor, low acidity, and naturally sweet.

cg-3.name: Espresso Tonic
cg-3.description: Double espresso served over tonic water, ice, and lemon. Citrusy, bubbly, and sophisticated.

cg-4.name: Coffee Frappe
cg-4.description: Blended drink with Dutch cream ice cream and coffee. An irresistible 'Milkshake'.

cg-5.name: Iced Banoffee
cg-5.description: Inspired by the English pie. Coffee, milk, banana, and caramel in a unique iced drink.

cg-6.name: Iced Vanilla Flat White
cg-6.description: Espresso, cold milk, and vanilla essence. Refreshing and aromatic.

cg-7.name: Iced Salted Caramel Flat White
cg-7.description: an addictive iced drink with coffee, milk, and the contrast of salted caramel.

cg-8.name: Iced Pistachio Flat White
cg-8.description: Iced coffee with milk and the unmistakable and sweet flavor of our pistachio cream.

cg-9.name: Iced Flat White
cg-9.description: The iced version of the classic. Double espresso, cold milk, and ice. Simple and striking.

cg-10.name: Iced Mocha
cg-10.description: Coffee, cold milk, and chocolate ganache. A refreshing liquid dessert.

m-2.name: Iced Berry Matcha
m-2.description: The surprising combination of iced Matcha with milk and a reduction of red fruits.

m-3.name: Iced Matcha Latte
m-3.description: Matcha served over cold milk and ice. The vibrant color and refreshing taste you need.

m-4.name: Matcha Latte
m-4.description: Matcha blended with steamed milk. Creamy, sweet in the right measure, and comforting.

m-5.name: Vanilla Matcha Latte
m-5.description: Our Matcha Latte with an aromatic touch of vanilla.

m-6.name: Traditional Matcha
m-6.description: Prepared with hot water. Intense vegetal flavor, umami, and pure energy.

g-1.name: Premium Açaí
g-1.description: Pure blended açaí, creamy and cold. Natural energy.

g-2.name: Red Fruit Milkshake
g-2.description: Cream ice cream blended with frozen red fruits.

g-3.name: Pistachio Milkshake
g-3.description: Ice cream blended with pistachio paste. Creamy and with authentic flavor.

g-4.name: Premium Açaí (Small)
g-4.description: Pure blended açaí, creamy and cold. Natural energy.

g-5.name: Banana Berry Smoothie
g-5.description: Banana and mixed berries. Rich, sweet, and nutritious.

g-6.name: Detox Smoothie
g-6.description: Mix of green leaves, apple, ginger, and pineapple. To cleanse and revitalize.

g-7.name: Mangocaxi Smoothie
g-7.description: The sunny union of mango with strawberry and pineapple. Refreshing and citrusy.

g-8.name: Mango Coconut Smoothie
g-8.description: Tropical and light. The sweetness of mango with the hydration of coconut water.

g-9.name: Açaí Smoothie
g-9.description: Creamy drink based on açaí blended with fruits.

o-1.name: Iced Chocolate
o-1.description: Refreshing and chocolatey, perfect for hot days.

o-2.name: Hot Chocolate
o-2.description: Creamy, dense, and made with real cocoa. A hug in drink form.

o-3.name: Sicilian Lemon Italian Soda
o-3.description: Sparkling water, Sicilian lemon syrup, and lots of ice. Citrusy and light.

o-4.name: Apple Italian Soda
o-4.description: Refreshing carbonated drink with the sweet and fruity flavor of green apple.

s-1.name: Butter Croissant
s-1.description: Classic French pastry, light, airy, and with a rich butter flavor.

s-2.name: Shrimp Empada
s-2.description: Sophisticated and tasty, with creamy shrimp filling.

s-3.name: Dried Meat Empada
s-3.description: Robust filling of desalinated and seasoned dried meat, wrapped in light dough.

s-4.name: Chicken Empada
s-4.description: 'Rotten' dough that melts in the mouth with seasoned and moist chicken filling.

s-5.name: Chicken with Catupiry Empada
s-5.description: The classic chicken filling finished with the creaminess of Catupiry cheese.

s-6.name: Heart of Palm Empada
s-6.description: Smooth and creamy filling of diced heart of palm in our buttery dough.

s-7.name: Ham & Cheese Sandwich
s-7.description: Toasted bread on the griddle with ham and melted cheese. Simple and delicious.

s-8.name: Cheese Bread
s-8.description: Authentic Minas Gerais recipe. Crunchy crust and soft interior with lots of cheese.

s-9.name: Grilled Cheese
s-9.description: Toasted bread filled with a generous layer of melted cheese.
